definitions: (of a machine or container) able to supply or release a product or cash

examples.text: the card can be recharged at the same dispensing machine

shortDefinitions: (of machine or container) able to supply or release product or cash

definitions: authorized or qualified to make up and give out medicine

examples.text: if in doubt, check with your dispensing pharmacy or doctor

shortDefinitions: authorized or qualified to make up and give out medicine
